entry.def: If you say that two people are well matched, you mean that they have qualities that will enable them to have a good relationship.

example.ex: They were well matched, I thought...
My parents were not very well matched...
example.tran: 我的父母并不十分般配。

entry.tran: (体育等竞赛中)不相上下的,势均力敌的
entry.def: In sports and other competitions, if the two opponents or teams are well matched, they are both of the same standard in strength or ability.

example.ex: Two well-matched sides conjured up an entertaining game...
example.tran: 双方势均力敌，奉献了一场精彩的比赛。

means.word_mean: 1. provided with a worthy adversary or competitor;
2. going well together; possessing harmonizing qualities
